title: Close-up of a Grasshopper
description: A detailed side view of a grasshopper perched on a vibrant red surface. The grasshopper is green with intricate patterns on its body, showcasing its legs and antennae.

title: Grasshopper Life Cycle
description: An illustration depicting the life cycle of a grasshopper. The cycle includes four stages: an egg (represented by a yellow oval), a nymph (a smaller grasshopper), and an adult grasshopper. Arrows indicate the progression from one stage to the next, illustrating the transformation from egg to nymph to adult.

title: Butterfly Life Cycle
description: An illustration depicting the life cycle of a butterfly. It shows four stages: an egg, a caterpillar (larva), a pupa (chrysalis), and an adult butterfly. Arrows indicate the progression from one stage to the next, illustrating the transformation process.

title: Geometric Shape
description: A simple geometric design featuring a white line forming a right angle against a black background.

title: Bee and Plant Interaction
description: An illustration showing a bee above a plant structure. The bee is depicted with its wings spread, and there is an arrow pointing down to a stylized representation of a plant's root system, which is shown in a cross-section view. The background is a gradient of blue and red, emphasizing the connection between the bee and the plant.
